SEARCH
Package app.src.resources.components

Class Button

java.lang.Object
app.src.resources.components.Component
app.src.resources.components.Button
public class Button extends Component
Extends the Component class with a Textfield and a Runnable action
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Button

      public Button(int width, int height, int x, int y)
      Creates a Button with size and location.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Button
      height - height of the Button
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location

    • Button

      public Button(int width, int height, int x, int y, String text)
      Creates a Button with size, location and text.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Button
      height - height of the Button
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location
      text - text displayed on the Button

    • Button

      public Button(int width, int height, int x, int y, Color color)
      Creates a Button with size, location and color.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Button
      height - height of the Button
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location
      color - color of the Button

    • Button

      public Button(int width, int height, int x, int y, String text, Color color)
      Creates a Button with size, location, text and color.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Button
      height - height of the Button
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location
      text - text displayed on the Button
      color - color of the Button

    • Button

      public Button(int x, int y, String imageName)
      Creates a Button with location and image. Loads the image from app/src/resources/assets. Size is taken from the image.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location
      imageName - image of the Button

    • Button

      public Button(int x, int y, String imageName, String text)
      Creates a Button with location, text and image. Loads the image from app/src/resources/assets. Size is taken from the image.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate for the location
      y - y coordinate for the location
      imageName - image of the Button
      text - text displayed on the Button

  • Method Details

    • setAction

      public void setAction(Runnable newAction)
      Takes a Runnable and stores it as action variable
      Parameters:
      newAction - new action to perform on button click

    • action

      public void action()
      Runs the defined action

    • fill

      public void fill(Color color)
      Takes a color and fills the Button with it.
      Parameters:
      color - new color for the Button

    • updateLabel

      public void updateLabel(String newText)
      Takes a String and puts in on the Button
      Parameters:
      newText - text to be displayed on the Button

    • actionCheck

      public void actionCheck(Point mousePosition)
      Takes the mouse location and compares it to the buttons corners. If the mouse location is inside the Button, the Buttons action will be perormed.
      Parameters:
      mousePosition - position to compare to the Button
